src:
Mody niang: “ousmane sonko est un don de dieu””macky amoul kaddu respectewoul…”
07 Nov 2019, 20:12 by La redaction
Lors de la conférence de presse du collectif CITOYEN SUNU 94 MILLIARDS NAY LEER, Mody Niang a salué la démarche de Ousmane Sonko pour la manifestation de la vérité dans l’affaire des 94 milliards. Il a aussi surtout chargé Macky Sall , coupable à ses yeux, d’entretenir la corruption au Sénégal.
text:
Mody niang: "ousmane sonko is a gift from god" "macky amoul kaddu respectwoul ..."
07 Nov 2019, 20:12 by The editorial team
During the press conference of the collective CITIZEN SUNU 94 BILLION NAY LEER, Mody Niang welcomed the step of Ousmane Sonko for the manifestation of the truth in the case of 94 billion. He also especially charged Macky Sall, guilty in his eyes, to maintain the corruption in Senegal.
